phrs.translation: 瘢痕, 斑痕, 伤痕, 伤疤

sentences.sentence: A multi-function cleaner, used to clean floor and other hard surface, can penetrate the dirt and bemirch and any dirt and cicatrice will not be left.
sentences.translation: 本品是一种功能众多的清洁剂，最适用于清洗地板和其它硬质表面，它能渗透污垢、污渍，且不留下任何斑痕和垢膜。

sentences.sentence: Results: Both two groups have effects of resisting cicatrice, lowering intraocular pressure, improving view. The effects of experimental group excel in that of control group ( P <0. 01, P <0. 05).
sentences.translation: 结果：两组都有抗斑痕及降压、提高视力等作用，但治疗组疗效优于对照组（P<0。05）。
